themes.description: This theme covers requests for new trading tools, indicators, or enhancements to existing trading functionalities.
Positive or negative feedback related to the availability, design, or functionality of specific features within the application.
Reviews related to Groww as an employer, including work-life balance, company policies, and employee experience, rather than product or service feedback.
This theme covers feedback related to the application's design, layout, navigation, ease of use, and overall user experience.
Issues or suggestions related to account features, settings, and fund management flexibility.
Issues related to unauthorized access, data privacy, unconfirmed transactions, and potential security vulnerabilities within the application.
Suggestions for new features, enhancements to existing functionalities, or improvements to the user experience.
This theme covers issues related to the generation, format, and quality of account statements, reports, and other official documents provided by the platform.
Issues related to the generation, format, accuracy, or availability of statements, reports, and other official documents.
Issues related to KYC, account activation, verification status, or the inability to perform actions due to account compliance requirements.
This theme covers feedback related to the platform's ability to provide stock recommendations, investment advice, or tools that assist users in making informed investment decisions.
This theme covers reviews that express overall satisfaction, appreciation, or general positive comments about the app or service without focusing on a specific feature or issue.
This theme covers reviews related to brokerage, hidden charges, deductions, taxation concerns, and financial transparency.
This theme captures reviews expressing satisfaction, praise, or positive experiences with the application's features, performance, or support.
This theme covers complaints about the absence of desired functionalities or features within the application or service.
Problems related to account activation, deactivation, KYC, profile updates, or linking/managing external accounts.
This theme covers complaints or feedback related to the results of investment applications, such as IPO allotments, or other investment-specific processes.
This theme covers requests for new investment products, trading segments (e.g., commodities), or expansion into new markets.
